title: [An exhortation to despise the gifts], whych we receaue by faylynge fortune
author: Thachame, T.
notes: Verse - "Why doeth the worlde carke and care, for glory that is vayne".
Imperfect: part of title lacking; title and imprint from and date estimated by STC.
Filmed with STC 23356: The life and death of Iacke Straw (London, 1593 [i.e. 1594]).
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
